name: BattleShip Online
description:
What's this game?

BattleShip Online is a Battle Royale.

We control a ship, attack buildings to get money and improve our ship to defeat the rest of the enemies

How many players?

The game is limited to 4 players in room and 20 in global game.

Is developed under Photon2 Free, a network plugin of Unity

2 players at least to begin game

Controls?

Move Camera: Mouse

Movement: W,A,S,D 

Shoot Left: Q

Shoot Rigth: E

Members: Game Designer Programmer Animator David Luengo González @LugonDev Ordnance 3D ModelAlejandro Trinidad @DonBobuenoShip 3D ModelPablo Manzano
